column1: A Triumphant Homegoing Celebration will be held Thursday
column3: 2015 at 1:00 p.m. at Goshen Disciple Church of Christ with Elder Donald Dewitt
column4: officiating.  Viewing will be held Wednesday
column6: 2015 from 3:00-7:00 p.m. at Garris Funeral Home Chapel.  The family will receive friends at the residence.
